description:
Las Palmas Elementary has high expectations for all students. There is a high level of parental involvement and support. As one of the higher-performing schools in the Twin Rivers Unified School District, our school takes pride in developing the potential of all students. Las Palmas Elementary hosts the Dual Immersion Program (one of two sites) in Twin Rivers.

The Dual Immersion Program is centered on promoting academic success by using language in a meaningful way. They will access authentic texts and content in various ways including books, websites, software and video conferences. By the end of the program, students will develop strong academic skills in listening, speaking, reading, and writing in both Spanish and English.
